bwwExcerpt: With his rugged rock voice, Pascal, best known as the original Roger in Jonathan Larson's Rent, seems miscast as a straitlaced, middle-aged businessman. He commands the stage, especially when he sings, but without conveying much emotion, or even Gere's ironic cool. Suskauer is lovely in Gregg Barnes' dazzling costumes, some of them copying the film's, and delivers her big Act II number, "I Can't Go Back," with conviction. But she doesn't project the magnetism or nail the eccentricities the role
